corpussource.title: ANALYSEREJUVVON DAVVISÁMI CEALKAGAT - DÁSSI 1 --- PRE-ANALYZED SÁMI SENTENCES - LEVEL 1

section.name: CEALKKALAHTUIN LEA DUŠŠE OKTA SÁTNI - THE CONSTITUENTS CONSIST OF ONLY ONE WORD EACH
Subjeakta + Verbála + Adverbiála - Subject + Verbal + Adverbial: SMEAa

corpus.section:
SOURCE: text SMEAa1) Čájet! A1 COM:cl P:v('čájehit',Imp,2SG) Čájet !
SOURCE: text SMEAa2) Máhtte boahtá. A1 STA:cl S:n-prop('Máhtte',sg,nom) Máhtte P:v('boahtit',ind,pr,3sg) boahtá .
SOURCE: text SMEAa3) Goabbá vuoitá? A1 QUE:cl S:pron('goabbá',<int>,sg,nom) Goabbá P:v('vuoitit',ind,pr,3sg) vuoitá ?

SOURCE: text SMEAa11) Odne arvá. A1 STA:cl A:adv('odne') Odne P:v('arvit',ind,pr,3sg) arvá .
SOURCE: text SMEAa12) Romssas arvá. A1 STA:cl A:n-prop('Romsa',plc,sg,loc) Romssas P:v('arvit',ind,pr,3sg) arvá .
SOURCE: text SMEAa13) Bohte maŋŋeleappos. A1 STA:cl P:v('boahtit',ind,pr,1DU) Bohte A:adv('maŋŋeleappos') maŋŋeleappos .

SOURCE: text SMEAa18) Son ballá guovžžas. A1 STA:cl S:pron('son',<pers>,3sg,nom) Son P:v('ballat',ind,pr,3sg) ballá A:n('guovža',sg,loc) guovžžas .

SOURCE: text SMEAa20) Báze dearvan! A1 COM:cl P:v('báhcit',Imp,2SG) Báze A:adv('dearvan') dearvan !

section.name: Cealkagat main lea objeakta - Sentences with object: SMEAb

corpus.section:
SOURCE: text SMEAb23) Dovddat go su? A1 QUE:cl P:v('dovdat',ind,pr,2SG) Dovddat PART:part('go') go Od:pron('son',<pers>,3sg,acc) su ?

corpus.section:
SOURCE: text SMEAc39) Máhtes lea beana. A1 STA:cl HAB:n-prop('Máhtte',sg,loc) Máhtes P:v('leat',ind,pr,3sg) lea fC:n('beana',sg,nom) beana .

section.name: CEALKKALAHTUIN LEAT EANET GO OKTA SÁTNI - THE CONSTITUENTS CONSIST OF MORE THAN ONE WORD
Subjeakta + Verbála + Adverbiála - Subject + Verbal + Adverbial: SMEAf

corpus.section:
SOURCE: text SMEAf84) Ale bala! A1 COM:cl P:g =D:v('ii',neg,Imp,2SG) Ale =H:v('ballat',conneg) bala !
SOURCE: text SMEAf85) Ean dáidde boahtit. A1 STA:cl P:g =D:v('ii',neg,ind,1DU) Ean =D:v('dáidit',ind,pr,conneg) dáidde =H:v('boahtit',inf) boahtit .

corpus.section:
SOURCE: text SMEAg97) Mu čeahci duddjo čáppa niibbi. A1 STA:cl S:g =D:pron('mun',<pers>,1sg,gen) Mu =H:n('čeahci',sg,nom) čeahci P:v('duddjot',ind,pr,3sg) duddjo Od:g =D:adj('čáppat',attr) čáppa =H:n('niibi',sg,acc) niibbi .
